title: Champion Select goes on even after I turned off my PC
body: This has happened before too. Whenever I shut down my PC I expect the client to dodge. But it doesn't.  I even got leaverbuster because of this. I humbly request Riot to count it as a dodge whenever someone exits the client in Champion Select. {{champion:40}} {{champion:121}}

replies.body: Your account was still in the champion lobby regardless of whether you yank the cord on your pc. Try this isn't going to help you avoid any penalties since dodging is still dodging.
